bibl.title: Statuette of a Snake-legged Anubis in the National Museum. Translation: Iwona Zych.
bibl.note: Warsaw National Museum, Inv. 148140. Comparative analysis leads to the conclusion that the bronze figurine of Anubis was executed in the first or second century AD.

bibl.title: Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.seg: Aleksandra Majewska, Statuette of a Snake-legged Anubis in the National Museum. Translation: Iwona Zych.
Warsaw National Museum, Inv. 148140. Comparative analysis leads to the conclusion that the bronze figurine of Anubis was executed in the first or second century AD.
